Nestled in a gated community overlooking the Atlantic Ocean, Hammock Dunes Club offers the Member Experience that you’ve been seeking. An oceanfront state of mind… elicits thoughts of relaxation and recreation with good friends in a spectacular oceanfront setting. It’s that lifestyle – that sets Hammock Dunes Club apart. Schedule My Visit Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Golf in Paradise Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: “Hammock Dunes Club is a Very Special Place. The Links is a World Class course on a World Class piece of land.” Tom Fazio, Course Designer The Championship Hammock Dunes Links Course is a Tom Fazio design with stunning oceanfront views. Players can enjoy 18 relaxing holes at the ocean or they can test themselves by playing the back tees at the Links. It’s a great choice to have to make. “Immersed in these natural surroundings a round of golf here is pure escape.” Rees Jones, course designer The Rees Jones Hammock Dunes Creek Course has a spectacular Championship layout. It meanders through 690 acres of native oaks, palms, wetlands and marsh. With seven sets of tees, this course has played host to U.S. Open qualifiers, the Florida Cup, Florida Open and the Florida Women’s Amateur Championship. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: Member Lifestyle Work It! Our 5,500 sq.ft. oceanfront Fitness Center offers fitness and fun at all levels. Select from personal training, strength workouts, and a diverse offering of group classes. Wicket Fun As one of the largest Croquet Associations in Florida, our very active program is recognized nationally and welcomes all levels of the game. Of the many pleasures accompanying participation it’s the social aspect and the wonderful camaraderie that keeps the ball rolling. Grand Slam Weekly players enjoy five Har-Tru tennis courts with a viewing pavilion and a comprehensive tennis program. Join the Round Robin matches and weekly clinics or schedule private court time. Love for the sport of pickleball continues to grow. On six courts, located in a wooded park, there are ample opportunities to learn the sport or enjoy a little friendly competition. Stay Satisfied Every venue for every taste. The Seaside Dining Room magnifies a coastal ambiance with tranquil interior spaces. The Dunes Tavern, features its own casual club atmosphere and indoor/outdoor oceanfront dining. Combined with the Low Country Style Creek Clubhouse, members experience delicious casual lunches or fine dining. Show Web Content (Article), Last Updated By: “The culture of the Club made this the easiest decision we’ve ever made.” Join our vibrant community and share your love for the best in fitness, fun and social life. Enjoy distinctive camaraderie and genuine hospitality in a relaxed, yet refined atmosphere. A unique and special blend of old and new, with a personal touch, Hammock Dunes Club is the place to be.
